mdRecord.dcterms:description: This article is about an exhibit which accompanied the release of the book, "The Streets of Lexington" by Winifred Hadsel. The exhibit, Who's Who in the Streets of Lexington, was sponsored by the Rockbridge Historical Society and the Department of Fine Arts at Washington and Lee University. The exhibit was to run from April 22 to June 6.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Streets of Lexington Exhibit Announced, April 29, 1985
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Street names
Hadsel, Winifred, 1917-
